name: My Jam
description:
What started out as a silly little Roguelike for the Lost Decade Games Jamuary 2017 Event turned into an emotional therapeutic exercise. Make no mistake, I made this game for me, but I hope that anyone can get something out of it.

Use WASD or the Arrow Keys and the space bar to find and catch all the missing cats.

If you like what you see, let me know on Twitter @ifman1

Go check out Lost Decade Games and their podcast, Lostcast, I can't say enough good things about these guys and the community that they've grown around them. Thanks LDG family. http://www.lostdecadegames.com/

And go get some tunes from Joshua Morse! https://joshuamorse.bandcamp.com/

If you want to make games quickly and easily or you want to prototype something really quick on PC, Mac, Linux, Android, IOS, or HTML, then check out the Game Creators' App Game Kit software. I couldn't have finished this Jam without it.
